author: 0xsadcat
content: I think so. imagine sharding with native zkrollups and some non-hardfork way to increase the number and size of shards (maybe validators vote the way miners vote now) and consensus algo either based on quantum resistant crypto, or with an option to switch to it under some condition (validators vote, or some ecdsa public key is broken). at that point it's hard to imagine need for any further fundamental improvements
